title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate, embed, and list local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package providing LangChain LLM and embeddings wrappers around Ollama’s local models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chat, file uploads, and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational CLI wrapper that adds persistent chat history and markdown rendering on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, generate, pull, and delete models from Java apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; chat, generate, and manage models.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example that streams responses from a local Ollama server via the ollama-js SDK.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for Ollama; declaratively install models and configure the daemon.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic wrappers over the Ollama REST API with Tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming JSON decoder.

title: ollama-php
summary: Lightweight PHP client for Ollama; chat, generate, and pull models with PSR-18 HTTP interfaces.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Ollama Modelfiles for fine-tuned and niche models.
